Name: Tropicalia
About the game: Tropicalia: a Brazilian Game is a RPG set in Brazil before colonization. The game is an ode to SNES-era jRPGs. To spice things up a bit, you will encounter here: Quick-Time Events in battle; Map Skills for exploration; You play as Kaique, a little Guarani warrior, who had his girlfriend kidnapped by the demigod Tau. The plot is based on actual Guarani mythology. Tropicalia is gameplay focused, the dialogue is used to set the atmosphere. Gather materials to craft new items. Have fun grinding at quick battles. Test your strategies against challenging bosses. Fish, swim, dive, jump, embroil. Here you will not meet Dragons and Dwarves. But get ready to face Kurupiras and Boetatas. Are You Ready For This Tropical Adventure?
